name: Couple them all
description:
DO NOT PLAY ON THE PHONE :) (it is completely broken)

Lost Relic Games June 2022 game jam entry.

I only used bought music and some free sound effects. Everything else was made during jam hours.

* Windows version zip is very big since the game was made in Libgdx and I had to pack java into the package in order to provide exe file. Enjoy!
